item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Teased For Xbox Game Pass
item.content:encoded:
One of the most well-received games of 2025 could be heading to Xbox Game Pass. A post on social media on Monday talked about the future of additions to Xbox Game Pass this year, with a not-so-subtle tease of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2.

“We’ve got quite the release slate lined up for Xbox Game Pass so far, this is going to be a huge year,” the “email” reads. “Oh, and speaking of upcoming releases… well, I shouldn’t say too much, but if you’re getting quite hungry for a fun adventure, all I can say is that something big is about to be deliverance’d to Xbox Game Pass…”

While not specifically naming the game, using the term “deliverance’d” is a dead giveaway for what’s to come. Xbox is getting ready to announce the next wave of games for the service, which could see it come sooner rather than later.

The original Kingdom Come: Deliverance is already available on the subscription service for those with an Ultimate, PC, or Premium membership.

Are you excited about the idea of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 coming to game pass? Leave your thoughts down in the comments and join the discussion in the official Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the six games canceled at Ubisoft when it announced its recent restructure. And for even more Insider Gaming delivered directly to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1704: Hints and Answer for February 17, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1704 for February 17, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, February 17, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1704 will give you a challenge, but not too much. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4.8 out of 6 guesses. That makes it slightly harder than the 4.2-guess average from February 16.

General Wordle Hints For February 17

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word usually refers to a group of people, not individuals.
  • Hint 2: It’s often used in sports, military, or team-based contexts.
  • Hint 3: The group it describes is typically small and organized.
  • Hint 4: You’re more likely to see this word in headlines or reports than casual speech.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1704 for February 17, 2026.

Starter Words For February 17, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • GUARD
  • QUASI
  • GROUP
  • QUILT
  • SCUFF

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1704 On February 17, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: SQUAD

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

SQUAD is a noun that can mean “a small number of soldiers, commonly 10 privates, a staff sergeant, and a corporal; the smallest military unit” or “any small group or party of persons engaged in a common enterprise.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1703 on February 16, 2026

Answer: ROOST

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1704?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on February 18 will be Wordle Game #1705.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter

item.title: Is Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 On PlayStation 5, Xbox, Or Nintendo Switch? Console Release, Explained
item.content:encoded:
The fifth chapter of Poppy Playtime is almost upon us, and console fans are bound to be wondering whether they can get in on the action.

It’s not one they’ll want to miss, either, as it’s rumoured to be the final part of the long-running saga. If you’re a PlayStation, Xbox, or Nintendo Switch owner and a fan of Poppy Playtime, here’s whether you can continue the journey or not.

Can You Play Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 On PlayStation 5?

Despite Chapters one through three being available on Sony’s latest console, Chapter 5 of Poppy Playtime will not be readily available on PlayStation 5 at launch.

The franchise was originally released on PC all those years ago, and ever since, the titles have first and foremost debuted there. Console ports were eventually developed for some older chapters, but it looks like PS5 fans will have to miss out—at least at launch.

It has been confirmed that a PS5 port will be developed in the future, but how far away it is remains to be seen.

Can You Play Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 On Xbox Series X|S?

It’s equally bad news for Xbox fans, as Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 won’t be available on either Xbox console alongside the PC launch.

Xbox fans often get the short end of the stick, with numerous titles opting to miss their systems in recent years. However, Chapter 5 of Poppy Playtime should arrive on Xbox eventually; it’s just a matter of when.

Can You Play Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 On Nintendo Switch 2?

Nintendo fans don’t fare any better; Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 will not be on the Nintendo Switch 2 at launch.

It might be majorly disappointing for Poppy Playtime fans, but there is a silver lining. As has been mentioned numerous times, console ports will arrive in the future, typically a few months after the PC release. It’s a shame, but console ports take time, especially for Indie devs like Mob Entertainment.

Are you disappointed by the news? Let your voice be heard in the official Insider Gaming Discord Server.

For more platform clarity, check out what platforms God Of War: Sons Of Sparta is playable on.

item.title: How Much Does Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 Cost? Price, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Mob Entertainment has excelled at delivering grit-your-teeth, bite-your-nails action through the Poppy Playtime series. It’s always been a well-priced franchise for such replayable content, but questions are being asked about Poppy Playtime Chapter 5’s price.

Greater quality means more work, which unfortunately factors in increased cost. Poppy Playtime has gotten bigger as the years have gone on, but so has its price tag. Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 could be the end for the franchise, and it could go out with an expensive bang.

How Much Is Poppy Playtime Chapter 5?

While there is no official confirmation as yet, Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 is expected to cost about $25, possibly going up to $30.

Everything shown from the Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 gameplay trailer suggests this is the most complete game to date. Mob Entertainment’s indie project has gone from free-to-play to a fairly premium price tag.

  • More Insider Gaming: Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 Release Date Countdown & Exact Start Times

It’s unlikely Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 is going to buck the trend, and it’s looking very likely that the price will go up again. In keeping with the previous chapter’s increase, Chapter 5 is probably going to cost in the region of $25-30 or £20-25.

Chapters 2 through 4 have seen a five-dollar increase each time. Still, this is mostly guesswork based on previous games and logic, so this is only a prediction for now.

This guide will be updated with the accurate price once the game is out and everyone knows for sure, so keep checking back!

How Much Have Previous Poppy Playtime Chapters Cost?

Historical data shows that each new chapter has raised the price between $5-10, with the first game having started as a free-to-play download.

Yes, the first game was (and still is) completely free to play. The journey had to start somewhere, and the price has only gone up as the years have gone by.

  • More Insider Gaming: Battlefield 6 Season 2 Release Date Countdown & Exact Start Times

Here’s a table showing the price of every Poppy Playtime Chapter.

Have you heard something Insider Gaming hasn’t? Do you think Chapter 5 will cost more or less than the predicted estimation? Leave any comments you have via the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

If you haven’t already, make sure to check out IG’s 10 best Horror games ever list for more horror games you need to play!

item.title: Battlefield 6 Season 2 Release Date Countdown & Exact Start Times
item.content:encoded:
Season 2 of Battlefield 6 is fast approaching, and a whole new wave of content is on the way. It will be split into three updates, but the first one is right around the corner.

From a new map to multiple new weapons and vehicles, it’s a great time to jump back into the war and fight on the frontline. But make sure you don’t miss the start times if you want to get in early for the new progression.

When Is Battlefield 6 Season 2 Coming Out? Release Date, Explained

After a hefty delay, Battlefield 6 Season 2 is set to release the first of content on Tuesday, February 17, 2026.

EA announced that Season 2 of Battlefield 6 would be delayed back in January, as they instead made plans to extend Season 1. This decision was made with the intention of improving the content on the way, as the studio wanted to refine and polish their plans for the future.

Well, it’s almost time to see whether that delay paid off, as Season 2 kickstarts on February 17.

Battlefield 6 Season 2 Release Times

You can hop into Season 2 of Battlefield 6 at 4 PM PT, with the download being available three hours earlier at 1 PM PT.

In case you’re a reader from a different time zone, fret not, as Insider Gaming has converted Battlefield 6 Season 2’s release times for your convenience down below.

Are you excited for Season 2 of Battlefield 6 to start? Share your thoughts in the official Insider Gaming Discord Server.

For more FPS guides, check out all of the Marathon Server Slam Playtest details.

item.title: Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 Release Date Countdown & Exact Start Times
item.content:encoded:
It’s been a while since a new chapter brought the nightmare-inducing Huggy Wuggy to the fore, which is why you should check out Poppy Playtime Chapter 5’s release date and start times to let some new horrors fester.

Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 is rumored to be the final part of the saga. Whether this ends up being the case remains to be seen, but one thing’s for sure: You shouldn’t miss out on Chapter 5. The Prototype is there to explore in its entirety, and it’s not long until you can do so.

When Is Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 Coming Out? Release Date, Explained

Mob Entertainment has issued a February 18 release date for Poppy Playtime Chapter 5.

If you’ve been on this journey to this point, number one, you’re brave, and number two, this could be the culmination of a five-year journey that has seen hilariously evil-looking Poppy Playtime merch appear all over the world and capture the minds and haunt the dreams of everyone in that time.

  • More Insider Gaming: Rainbow Six Siege X Operation Silent Hunt—Start Date, Release Times & All Content, Explained

Huggy Wuggy has been anything but cute and adorable in that time (maybe the most misleading name in history), and it’s back to chase you around The Prototype.

The new chapter is scheduled for February 18, so prepare yourself.

Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 Release Times

You can begin the descent into danger from 9 AM PT for Poppy Playtime Chapter 5, and the time zone differences will be adjusted from region to region.

To make this nice and easy to follow, Insider Gaming has whipped up a table showing Poppy Playtime Chapter 5’s release dates and times.

  • More Insider Gaming: How To Play Marathon Server Slam Playtest—Dates, Times, Platforms & Content

See if your time zone or region is on here. If it’s not, please get in touch with the team!

Could this be five and out for Poppy Playtime? Or do you think Mob Entertainment has even more horrific content planned for the game in 2027? Share your thoughts on the new game and series as a whole through the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Read the news that the PS6 may be released as late as 2029 for more content.
